column3: Up to 30 pieces per customer per day, waived;
Over 30 pieces per customer per day, HK$1 per additional cheque.
For HKD / RMB Notes, up to 200 pieces of notes  per customer per day, waived;
For HKD / RMB Notes, over 200 pieces of notes per customer per day, 0.25% on deposit amount (min. HK$50);
